name: Bed Sharing
description: Two characters forced to share a bed, tempting them into a sexual encounter.

name: Can't Resist Big Dick
description: Character tempted into sexual acts by a large penis.

name: Coerced
description: Character is gradually persuaded to perform escalating sexual acts.

name: Corporal Punishment
description: Using physical force to cause pain or discomfort as a method of punishment.

name: Hazing
description: Requiring a new or potential member of an organization to perform sexual or humiliating acts.

name: Infertility
description: Infertility drives a character to look outside their relationship for sex resulting in pregnancy.

name: Punishment Sex
description: Using sexual acts as a method of punishment.

name: Revenge
description: Exacting revenge for some perceived slight or injustice, typically through some sexual act.

name: Ritual Sex
description: A religious, spiritual, symbolic, or magickal ritual incorporating sex acts.

name: Seducer
description: Male character initiates the sexual encounter.

name: Seductress
description: Female character initiates the sexual encounter.

name: Sex for Money
description: Character getting paid for the sexual encounter with their scene partner.

name: Sexual Favor
description: Doing a favor in exchange for sex.

name: VideoShoot
description: Motivation for one or more characters in the scene is to do sexual acts as part of a video that is being filmed.

name: Winner Fucks Loser
description: A rule common in wrestling match where the winner of the match fucks the loser in their preferred style.
